segments.text: I see the water spilling everywhere, and it’s making me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is standing in it like it’s nothing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are sneaking cookies, and I can’t help but smile at their mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is so determined to get that cookie, even if it means risking a fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just as guilty, waiting with her hand out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they’ve done this before and gotten away with it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely clueless, and it’s kind of funny.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is chaotic, but in a way that makes me laugh.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope they don’t get caught, but I also hope no one gets hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is going to cause a big mess if no one stops it soon.
segments.speaker: PAR
